solution_line_template: At each feeding Billy serves {num_horses} horses x {pounds_per_horse_per_feeding} pounds of oats/horse = <<{num_horses}*{pounds_per_horse_per_feeding}={pounds_per_feeding}>>{pounds_per_feeding} pounds/feeding
Each day Billy uses {pounds_per_feeding} pounds of oats/feeding x {feedings_per_day} feedings/day = <<{pounds_per_feeding}*{feedings_per_day}={pounds_per_day}>>{pounds_per_day} pounds of oats/day

Triple that amount to find the amount of oats needed to feed the four horses for three days: {pounds_per_day} pounds of oats/day x {num_days} days = <<{pounds_per_day}*{num_days}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds
